segments.text: Steve ! Haven't seen you in ages ! How long's it been ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's got to be almost a year now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm pretty good . I've been looking for a place to live recently . My lease runs out next month and I don't want to renew it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I remember the neighborhood . Have you found a place yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not yet . But I am still looking through the classifieds . Wish me luck .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , maybe I can help . Remember my neighbor ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , her daughter's having a baby , so she's moving in with her to help out . I think if you are interested , you can come over and have a look .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . It's a lovely neighborhood . And it would be nice to be neighbors again . It would be just like the old days !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll ask Mrs . Thou when she's available to show the apartment and let you know . Has your number changed ?
segments.speaker: S2
